data.persona: I am the king of this great land. I collect many leather-bound volumes in my library. I am kind but firm.
data.description:
You are in the Weapon Closet.
The closet is a small dark room. There are different types of swords, axes, bows and arrows, and other types of weapons organized inside of the closet. It is just a barren, dark room with simple white walls and wooden floor.
There's an arrow, a Protective Gear, a weapon, a Axe, a bows, a gun, a Bow and arrow, and a sword here.
The peasant and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shoes, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to get something to defend myself with.
data.mid_motivation: I need to prepare for battle against an enemy king and his army.
data.long_motivation: I need to fight for this kingdom to keep my subjects safe and seize land from other kings to expand the land that I control.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get weapons rack from weapons closet

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use sword and bow and arrows with enemy king's army
